reviewText: Works with our DVD but not Blue Ray player.  See warning about DVD region.  Good quality Chinese and English.

Yay! Mandarin Thomas for my Lil' Dude... The format is 4:3 and has the voice and subtitles in Mandarin. The voice acting isn't the best but they do use different actors for the various roles. It is in Region 6 so you will have to either change the region on your DVD player or find another way to make it work.

Finally I got the right one. This is the real "movie" type cartoon, not that kind of "doll/puppet' style cartoon I last bought which most of the time the narrator does the talking in it. It's worth it as I use it to influence my kids loves more Chinese Mandarin language.
